products.title: Sevilla Tranquility Twilight Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: Deep, dark and ever so inviting, this sevilla tranquility twilight blue vertical blind has a plush and luxurious colour that will make your home feel like a palace. Each vane has a blackout backing so that when these blinds are closed your room will feel snug and sheltered mak deep, dark and ever so inviting, this sevilla tranquility twilight blue vertical blind has a plush and luxurious colour that will make your home feel like a palace.

products.title: Lazaro Twilight Vertical Blind
products.description: A soft delicate fabric with two tonal threads giving it a textured look. Avavilable in other colours. Lazaro twilight vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Lazaro Twilight
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
